flawed_nl_solution:
If in six years Xavier will be 30 years old, he is 30-6 = <<30-6=20>>20 years old now.
If Xavier is twice as old as Yasmin, Yasmin is 20/2 = <<20/2=10>>10 years old.
The total of their ages now is 10+20 = <<10+20=30>>30 years
#### 30

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
